ygData.msgSnippet: Uh, I was talking about text characters (something I realised I didn t make clear until I sent the message) not in-game characters and items :) The thing with

Uh, I was talking about text characters (something I realised I didn't make
clear until I sent the message) not in-game characters and items :)

The thing with laying bombs or other weapons/items on the ground is game
engine related, you can try to put them in the editor (or if it won't let
you, convert to a text file, put them in the objects section, bump the
number of objects up, and convert it to a scenario file) and see what
happens.  I believe it has something to do with it's state and who planted
it, but I'm not sure (it was in a previous message when someone asked about
some odd error that popped up in game).

I can probably use one of the extended ASCII characters, except they usually
show up as a little square box in a text editor (like notepad, wordpad) and
you don't want to remove them cause you may not be able to put it back :)
It also makes hand-building a new line harder, though you could just copy
and paste it if you wanted.
I'll try doing that tonight, gotta get it and a couple of other things
finished soon before the uni workload picks up and it stops *everything*
again :(

- Deathifier

----- Original Message -----
From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Subject: [gladiator] Re: Disallowed characters in Gladiator.

> > Hi,
> > Does anyone know if specific characters are not allowed in

>
